project_abstract.cdata: The project would comprise: (a) engineering and construction of a cold rolling mill complex designed to produce about 30,000 tons per year of stainless steel sheet and strip from hot-rolled coils; (b) engineering and construction of a rod and bar rolling mill complex designed to produce about 120,000 tons per year of alloy steel rod and bar products from billets; (c) training of staff in the application of special production processes and techniques and in plant management and operation; and (d) studies on the end uses of Otelinox's products, on the feasibility of the establishment of intermediate warehouse facilities and steel service centers, and on the export potential for Romanian special steel products.
